This is what the Eternal Lord has to say:

The man whose appearance was like bronze then took me through the entrance next to the gateway and led me to the priests’ sacred chambers, which faced northward. He took me to a place on the far western side.
Then my guide brought me to the outer courtyard and took me to each of its four corners. In each corner were smaller, confined courts, each measuring 70 feet long and 52½ feet wide.
There was a stone shelf that ran along the inside wall of each of the four courts. Beneath these stone shelves were hearths.
